item.title: Pothole close to slip road to Junction 11 M5 Southbound, 31st March
item.description:
There is a big pothole on lane 1 on the M5 at the beginning of the slip road for junction 11 heading south on the motorway. It is a big hole which caused quite a bump when driving over it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Unbearably noisy manhole covers!, 31st March
item.description:
At least 10 noisy drain/manhole covers on Lancaster Road and Yew Tree Road. Mainly where Lancaster Road meets Yew Tree Road. Volume of traffic makes it unbearable at night but itâ€™s all day everyday! Has been like this since Christmas

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lancaster Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury

item.title: Numerous drains permanently blocked, 31st March
item.description:
I received one of your cyclostyle replies saying all drains were cleared annually. The drains and culverts between the Winchcombe town sign and Rushly Lane have not been cleared in at least the last three years. I have reported it every year but the road teams stop at the Winchcombe sign. At least a dozen drains and culverts are blocked semi-permanently. I have taken photos of them all this morning and many are totally choked with mud on both sides of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Brockhampton Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sofa and other items, 31st March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bishop's Cleeve

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, Alma Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
